quoteText: If we make a significant or material change in the way we use or share your personal information, you will be notified via email and/or prominent notice within the NYT Services at least 30 days prior to the changes taking effect.
title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance
